abstract: Russia's Federal Security Service detains terrorist cell in Moscow it claims had bomb; also says several of those detained had trained with Islamic State in Syria.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s main security agency said an “explosive device” was found in an apartment frequented by people who had trained with the Islamic State.

headline.main: Russia Says It Has Detained a Terrorist Cell in Moscow
headline.print_headline: Russia Says It Detained Terrorist Cell in Moscow

snippet: Russia’s main security agency said an “explosive device” was found in an apartment frequented by people who had trained with the Islamic State.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
